author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the chard and leeks and cook for three minutes. Add the chicken stock, bring to the boil and cook for a further five minutes. Add the double cream and stir well. To serve, place the soup in a bowl and top with the cooked pancetta.
